description: Contains categories for products, including parent-child relationships.

columns.name: ParentProductCategoryID
columns.description: Product category identification number of immediate ancestor category. Foreign key to ProductCategory.ProductCategoryID.

columns.name: rowguid
columns.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
